summary: The module implements a lightweight, custom constraint‑satisfaction solver tailored for the CSPLayout transpiler pass. It wraps a recursive backtracking search, enforces a configurable cap on recursive calls, and exposes methods to obtain the found assignment and to track whether the call limit was reached.
business_intent: Enable bounded, deterministic solving of qubit‑placement constraints during quantum circuit transpilation, improving layout determination while preventing excessive recursion overhead.
